name: circleci
label: CircleCI
description: CircleCI is the continuous integration & delivery platform that helps the development teams to release code rapidly and automate the build, test, and deploy. CircleCI can be configured to run very complex pipelines efficiently with caching, docker layer caching, resource classes and many more. After repositories on GitHub or Bitbucket are authorized and added as a project to circleci.com, every code triggers CircleCI runs jobs. CircleCI also sends an email notification of success or failure after the tests complete.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the CircleCI server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API Key used to access the CircleCI APIs and perform automated operations.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Version Control System Type
fields.description: Specify the type version control system, you can choose between Github and Bitbucket.
fields.name: vc_type

fields.title: Organization Name
fields.description: organization is your username or organization name in your version control system.
fields.tooltip: organization is your username or organization name in your version control system.
fields.name: organization

fields.title: Project Name
fields.description: Specify the name of the project in your Version Control System
fields.tooltip: Specify the name of the project in your Version Control System
fields.name: project

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Workflows List
operations.description: Retrieves summary metrics for a project's workflows. Workflow runs going back at most 90 days are included in the aggregation window. Metrics are refreshed daily, and thus may not include executions from the last 24 hours

parameters.title: Version Control System Type
parameters.description: Specify the type version control system, you can choose between Github and Bitbucket.
parameters.name: vc_type

parameters.title: Organization Name
parameters.description: organization is your username or organization name in your version control system.
parameters.tooltip: organization is your username or organization name in your version control system.
parameters.name: organization

parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project in your Version Control System
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project in your Version Control System
parameters.name: project

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.description: Specify the token to retrieve the next page of results.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the token to retrieve the next page of results.
parameters.name: page-token

parameters.title: Fetch Data From
parameters.description: Specify from where to fetch data, available options available are Retrieve Data From All Branches and Retrieve Data From A Specific Branch.
parameters.name: branch_name
options: Retrieve Data From A Specific Branch

Retrieve Data From A Specific Branch.title: Branch Name
Retrieve Data From A Specific Branch.description: The name of a vcs branch. If not passed default branch will be used.
Retrieve Data From A Specific Branch.tooltip: The name of a vcs branch. If not passed default branch will be used.
Retrieve Data From A Specific Branch.name: branch

parameters.title: Reporting Window
parameters.description: Specify the time window to calculate summary metrics.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time window to calculate summary metrics.
parameters.name: reporting-window

operations.title: Get Artifacts List
operations.description: Retrieves the artifacts list from the CircleCI job based on the job number provided.

parameters.title: Job Number
parameters.description: Specify the job number to retrieve its artifacts
parameters.name: job-number

parameters.description: Specify the type version control system, you can choose between Github and Bitbucket.

parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the project in your Version Control System

operations.title: Get Workflow Jobs List
operations.description: Retrieves the jobs list from the CircleCI workflow based on the id of the workflow provided.

parameters.title: Workflow ID
parameters.description: Specify the workflow ID to retrieve its jobs
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Workflow Last Runs
operations.description: Retrieves the recent runs of a workflow based on the workflow name provided. Runs going back at most 90 days are returned.

parameters.title: Workflow Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the workflow from which to retrieve its last runs details.
parameters.name: workflow-name

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.description: Include only executions that started at or after this date. This must be specified if an end-date is provided.
parameters.tooltip: Include only executions that started at or after this date. This must be specified if an end-date is provided.
parameters.name: start-date

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.description: Include only executions that started before this date. This date can be at most 90 days after the start-date.
parameters.tooltip: Include only executions that started before this date. This date can be at most 90 days after the start-date.
parameters.name: end-date

operations.title: Trigger Workflow
operations.description: Triggers a new pipeline on the project.
